title: How to Draw a Cartoon Dolphin

steps.headline: Draw a long slightly curved oval for the Body.
Add a turned triangle one third from the start for the fin.
Add another coming off the end of the oval to add the Tail.
Add a add a rounded tip on the oval.
Add a triangle on the underneath with another coming out on it for his other fins.

text: Draw a long slightly curved oval for the Body.  Add a turned triangle one third from the start for the fin.  Add another coming off the end of the oval to add the Tail.  Add a add a rounded tip on the oval. This will make the nose. Add a triangle on the underneath with another coming out on it for his other fins.  Finished.
